data.message: I really don't like that any comment or Like I make on any Facebook page puts up a notification on the wall of friends and friends of friends.  Is there a way to make those private, IF I wanted everyone to know who I look at or what I comment on I'd tell them.

replies.message: Hi Patsy. Information on followers, public posts and comments, and notification settings can be found here: http://bit.ly/2rWFl6z. -Elizabeth
Yeah, that link doesn't answer her question. I have the same problem.
I agree with Patsy... and I don't care what my friends like or say on OTHER people's posts. I only want to see my friends posts AND the pages I liked.
Me too, I don't like to see what's others likes or whatever .. I only wanna see my friends posts and the pages I liked. But I think there's a purpose
